about_the_game:
Experience Cosmic Harmony with the Wisdom of Katakamuna in This Idle Game

This game, inspired by the enigmatic ancient Japanese civilization of "Katakamuna," is an idle game designed for those who wish to embrace an age of love and harmony. Through this game, you will embark on a journey to connect with the universe and discover the profound truths of life and the resonances of the heart.

Gather "Ka," the essence of all existence, to complete all 80 chants of the Katakamuna. Known as the "Katakamuna Utahi," these chants are blessings bestowed upon us by the universe. As you unravel the mysteries of the Katakamuna Utahi and become one with the universe, all secrets will begin to connect.

Features

  • A Deep Idle Experience
    Every action within the game becomes increasingly automated as progress unfolds. In this idle game, you weave the verses of the Katakamuna Utahi, completing the harmony of colors and sounds. Even when the game is not running, your journey continues, allowing you to naturally feel the harmony of Katakamuna in your daily life.

  • Messages That Connect the Universe and the Heart
    As you advance, cryptic messages will appear. These are the voices of the universe and, simultaneously, questions posed by your own self. These messages will take different forms depending on your choices, weaving a unique narrative.

  • Visuals and Sounds That Express Harmony
    The beautiful colors and resonances inspired by Katakamuna spread throughout the game. Its serene and mystical visual design, paired with sounds that resonate deeply, enriches the gameplay experience.

  • A Journey of Self and Cosmic Exploration
    Your actions shape the universe within the game. This journey is an experiential manifestation of the Katakamuna teaching that "the heart reflects reality." Rediscover the harmony between yourself and the cosmos as you delve into the depths of your inner self.

What is Katakamuna?

Over 10,000 years ago, an ancient civilization called "Katakamuna" flourished in what is now Japan and its surrounding regions in Asia. The people of this civilization were highly spiritual, living in connection with the universe in a world of love and harmony, free from ego and conflict. "Kata" represents "things with form (the visible world)," while "Kamu" signifies "life energy (the invisible world)." By understanding both aspects, they are believed to have harnessed the vibrations of the heart and wielded the energy of the universe with incredible mastery.

The Katakamuna documents, believed to originate from this ancient civilization, consist of 80 verses arranged in spiral patterns. These "Katakamuna Utahi" were composed in a traditional 7-5 rhythm. The 5th and 6th verses, in particular, are structured with 48 phonetic sounds, forming the basis of modern Japanese (especially Katakana).

Each of the 48 sounds of the Katakamuna glyphs embodies an invisible physical law encoded in its sacred vibrations, unveiling the secrets of universal creation and the cycle of life. This timeless wisdom continues to illuminate our lives with new insights, offering profound truths relevant even in the modern era.

Embark on a harmonious journey where the universe and the heart connect in Katakamuna Idle.
